recipe_name: Lentil salad with herbs and Toulouse sausage
author: Paul Rankin
method: For the lentil salad, mix all the salad ingredients together in a mixing bowl and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper. For the Toulouse sausage, rub the patty with the olive oil and pan-fry for two minutes on each side, unitl lightly browned. Serve the lentil salad on a serving plate with the patty on top.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  1 tbsp balsamic vinegar,  100g/3½oz canned lentils, rinsed and drained,  50g/1¾oz fresh green beans, blanched and chopped,  50g/1¾oz each fresh parsley, coriander, chives,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  100g/3½oz sausage meat shaped into a patty,  1 tbsp olive oil,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
